name: International Electrotechnical Commission
goal: The IEC develops International Standards and Conformity Assessment systems in the area of electrotechnology, namely electricity, electronics, and information technologies (www.iec.ch/about/activities/).
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Involvement in European Multi-Stakeholder Platform on ICT Standardisation
Following of EU Harmonized Standards through CENELEC
